welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Salvador, Cuba! Known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and stunning architecture, we invite you to immerse yourself in all this beautiful city has to offer and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.description: The main terminal at Guantanamo NAS Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
